reference.title: SendMsg : To send a J1939 message

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will put the message on the J1939 network. The message structure STJ1939_MSG will be filled with ID, length, data, channel.

section.title: Inputs
section.p: STJ1939_MSG* - Pointer to J1939 Message Structure

section.title: Returns
section.p: 1 on successful transmisstion. 0 value on failure.
